general.name: skymodel
general.description: Parameters of best-fit model of global sky (Blanton et al. 2011). Stage 1 and stage 2 correspond to fitting of Y and X respectively in Section 2.3 of that paper.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
